channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @paulrfoth @WillCarterII @adam_a_perez It could be yours for the proverbial song. Sadly, I can’t make out the table of contents. https://t.co/q3UFp9mY3n
@Shmarya I doubt it’s that straightforward or honest.

@trekonomics People want happy endings and narrative arcs. There’s a reason synagogues are full of the children of Holocaust survivors.
@trekonomics Pro tip: You can be the first one to write a post climate collapse novel where the Exxon exec gets a redemptive arc.
@trekonomics Karl Rove more recently.

@MisfitTorah 8 commandments. As it is written: Al chet..,
@MisfitTorah Maybe it’s a Dan Bern reference? Listen to Lightning Jazz here. https://t.co/zcNyHZF2Nr
@kampeas From Jackson to Jackson there was none like Jackson. Except maybe Jesse and Janet.
@atrubek I stumbled upon it 40 years later, after I had started my POD-based publishing company. It was pretty amazing.
@ZacharyBraiterm @DandiaAsad @comradesanchez When your origin myth is a 19th century political society….

@atrubek What you should know about Fredrick Pohl is that in a Galaxy Magazine editorial at the time of the 1966 NYC newspaper strike sparked by the automation of typesetting, he predicted that technology would inevitably advance to print on demand and began to muse about the consequences
@trekonomics @ReplyGuyTilIDie He’s speaking at local Jewish federation in the very near future. I could probably score you a ticket.
@TheRaDR @HIASrefugees https://t.co/jjJq5o8KwV I wrote about last year’s model.
@TheRaDR @datadivajf @HIASrefugees I wrote about last year’s model.
@evendrones @AllredMD @Manruss Trying to figure out: If a must-buy artist collaborates with a must-buy writer, must I buy two copies?
@harrymwood And I appreciate that.
@ChemiShalev On the other hand, they’re now buying weapons from Israel. Which is kind of amazing to those of us who know the role Czech weapons played in the early days of Israel.
@NickTagliaferro Other than the trademark issues, would a Vulcan-ear-shaped edible be kosher?
@ryanlcooper Brooks family values. It’s in her name.
@lavietidhar Pulped fiction!
@lavietidhar Serves you right for abandoning important historical events like the Uganda Plan for obscure medieval myths.

@rmneiss Our local federation is on board with the OU. Which accepts Schecters as well as Catholic and Muslim schools under its lobbying umbrella.
@rmneiss But here the OU is leading the way. Of course, the budgets of Bergen County day schools dwarf the federation budget.
@rmneiss I expect the Supreme Court will legalize direct funding of parochial schools shortly. As it is, the OU is boasting of a billion dollars in state aid to Jewish schools in the past decade.
@jamesdnicoll Nothing made of protons is permanent.
@jamesdnicoll Have you heard the good news about proton decay?
